full_text: My grandma is in heaven and yes I talk to her everyday
Idk care what your dude said ain't nobody gonna tell me when and where I can't go my daughter wants me here so mfer that's where I am going to be ...u better check yo self ...
Name the game Mike Jordan became Micheal Jordan....and go
Me and my daughter have had a bound since she was 6 she always been by my side ALWAYS
I can't loose the relationship I have with my daughter that would tear my heart out she is all I got ....
God has a plan for me idk what it is but I know he has one
I get treated like I am a f**king nobody I AM HER PARENT TOO mfer...
I gotta do better for myself and my daughter....time for alot of changes...
Starting a new job today I am a little nervous
I am trying to change for the better
